## Content Update Information

### Type of Update
Please check the relevant option:

- [ ] Correction (fixing errors or inaccuracies)
- [ ] Update (updating outdated information)
- [ ] Enhancement (improving or expanding content)
- [ ] Translation (adding or updating translations)
- [ ] Formatting (improving structure or formatting)

### Post/Content to Update
- Post Slug: ``
- Post Title: ``

Or provide a link to the content that needs updating.

## What Needs to be Updated

### Current Content
Describe or quote the current content that needs updating.

### Proposed Changes
Describe the changes you want to make and why.

### New Content (if applicable)
If you're replacing content, provide the new content here.

## Rationale
Explain why this update is necessary (e.g., outdated information, error correction, clarity improvement).

## Additional Information
Any additional information, references, or context that supports this update.
